text:
Despite being an Eastie, I did not know the existence of this cafe until a friend brought me here. This, is a hidden gem.

They serve awesome salads here, alongside with sandwiches. There's a wide variety of cakes you can choose, and when pairing with coffee, the coffee is discounted.

Since discovering this place, I have been a repeat visitor.....making a beeline for the salads!
The in-room dining service at Grand Mercure Roxy was nice. It comes from the Roxy Devine cafe.
Staff was friendly with a warm personality. The cafe was spacious and brightly lit. Wished that there are much more choices of cakes and types of samdwiches being served.

This is indeed a hidden gem in Hotel Mercure Lobby. The salad is so good and has 30% after 6 pm. Latte is also wonderful. Most impt it has a quiet and peaceful ambience. Will definitely be back again!
$10 moutai lychee cake, simply awesome with a touch of alcohol ðŸ˜‹ðŸ’¯
